resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103101</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103101</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206212</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Infrared Astronomy Tutorial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotastronomietutorial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cours d'instruction Infrarouge d'Astronomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tutorial Infravermelho Da Astronomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione privata Infrarossa Di Astronomia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρο σεμινάριο αστρονομίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía Infrarroja De la Astronomía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines infrared light, how it was discovered, infrared astronomy, atmospheric windows, and more. An infrared astronomy timeline is included, along with links to news and discoveries, images, and classroom activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft Infrarotlicht, wie es entdeckt wurde, 
Infrarotastronomie, atmosphärische Fenster und mehr. Ein 
Infrarotastronomie timeline ist, zusammen mit Links zu den Nachrichten
und zu den Entdeckungen, Bilder und Klassenzimmeraktivitäten 
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la lumière infrarouge, comment on l'a 
découvert, l'astronomie infrarouge, fenêtres atmosphériques, et 
plus. Une chronologie infrarouge d'astronomie est incluse, avec 
des liens aux nouvelles et aux découvertes, des images, et des 
activités de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a luz infravermelha, como se descobriu, a 
astronomia infravermelha, janelas atmosféricas, e mais. Um 
timeline infravermelho da astronomia é incluído, junto com as 
ligações às notícias e às descobertas, imagens, e atividades da 
sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la luce infrarossa, come è stato 
scoperto, astronomia infrarossa, finestre atmosferiche e più. 
Un timeline infrarosso di astronomia è incluso, con i 
collegamenti alle notizie ed alle scoperte, immagini ed attività 
dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει το υπέρυθρο φως, πώς ήταν ανακαλυμμένη, 
υπέρυθρη αστρονομία, ατμοσφαιρικά Windows, και περισσότερο. 
Μια υπέρυθρη υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο αστρονομίας 
συμπεριλαμβάνεται, μαζί με τις συνδέσεις με τις ειδήσεις και τις 
ανακαλύψεις, τις εικόνες, και τις δραστηριότητες τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la luz infrarroja, cómo fue descubierto, 
la astronomía infrarroja, ventanas atmosféricas, y más. Un 
timeline infrarrojo de la astronomía es incluido, junto con 
conexiones a las noticias y a los descubrimientos, las imágenes, y 
las actividades de la sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206212</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103101</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/infrared-astronomy-tutorial</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
